thread.title: ABC Nightline apologizes to Priyanka Chopra for confusing her with another Indian actress
thread.title_full: ABC Nightline apologizes to Priyanka Chopra for confusing her with another Indian actress

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: ABC Nightline apologizes to Priyanka Chopra for confusing her with another Indian actress
text:
Comments 
Los Angeles, Sep 30: ABC’s “Nightline” is apologizing for confusing new network star Priyanka Chopra with another Indian actress. The news magazine aired a feature earlier this week about Chopra, the star of ABC’s new drama “Quantico.” A video shot supposedly showing Chopra in the Miss World pageant was included. 
But the video was of Yukta Mookhey, who won the crown in 1999. Chopra was the 2000 Miss World winner. The error was noted online by viewers, and ABC responded with an apology and posted a corrected version of the “Nightline” story online. (ALSO READ: Quantico star Priyanka Chopra makes a stunning appearance on Live with Kelly and Michael (Watch Video)
